channel.title: Sections on TITOLO
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on TITOLO

item.title: Configuring About Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The About section should give the viewer a brief idea about yourself. In this post, we are going to configure the About section of your website. At first, create about.yaml file in the data directory of your site.

item.title: Configuring Skills Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The Skills section should give the viewer an idea about not only the list of skills you have but also an idea of the depth of your knowledge on a particular skill. In this post, we are going to configure the Skills section of your site.

item.title: Configuring Experiences Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The Experiences section has been designed to truly reflect your career background. It should give the viewer an idea about the responsibilities you have handled in various stages of your career. In this post, we are going to configure the Experiences section of your site.

item.title: Configuring Projects Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The Projects section has been designed to showcase your projects in a meaningful way. In this post, we are going to configure the Projects section of your site. At first, create a projects.yaml file in the data directory of your site.

item.title: Configuring Recent Posts Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The Recent Posts section does not require any configuration. It will be automatically populated when you write any posts.

item.title: Configuring Achievements Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/en/sections directory and should follow this format. The Achievements section has been designed to showcase your achievements in a gallery view. This post will show how to configure the Achievements section of your site. At first, create an achievements.yaml file in the data directory of your site.
